title: inDaliha vaLarunnu
sahitya:
inDaliha vaLarunnu hE mAnini endu cEyvatu jnyAninnu


anupallavi

  paNDirunna rAgam shrI padmanAbhanu mayi taNDArshara nilayE taruNi karakamUlam


caraNam 1    idu nEram manasi janIha pOla sharangaL matimukhi coriyunnu mama mArvil 
catura guNam koNDu sakhi mAnasam kavarunnu catikal ceyvatumati sarasanu citamamO
    caraNam 2    tarasA jIva nAyakan tandE savidhE cennu paravasha takaLellAm paraka nI 
karuNAlEsham engaL kkaNavanuNDennAkil arukil varuvatinAyudhana tAmasikkumO
